CustomField.description: To be used to determine whether a CCC case is a complaint /*This is setting setting a complaint flag to true if and only if it is a Feedback or Investigation and the Enquiry sub type is one of the ones listed - so by default the case will not be a complaint unless t matches the values below*/
CustomField.formula: If ((ISPickval( Type, "Feedback") ||Ispickval(Type,"Investigation")) && (IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Address not in NAF")|| IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"All Other")|| IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Article carded - no card left")|| IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Article carded - no delivery attempt")|| IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Article safe dropped - no delivery attempt")|| IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Article safe dropped - not located")|| IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Article safe dropped unsafe location")|| IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Complaint")|| IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Complaint referred to issuer")|| IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Damaged/Missing contents")|| IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Damage to property")|| IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Damage to vehicle")|| IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Delayed")|| IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Delayed - inside network") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Delayed - outside network") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Delivery complaint") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Disputed delivery") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Domestic Letters - Other") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Domestic Parcels - Other") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Incorrect mail being redirected/held") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Incorrect or missing order") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"International Letters - Other") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"International Parcels - Other") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Mail not being redirected/held") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Missed/Late Pickup") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Missing Item") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Money & Insurance - Other") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"MRSO issue") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Pick up issue") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Post Office & Hub - Other") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Product issue") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Queue times") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Remittance not received") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Safety issue")|| IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"SPB - Graffiti/Damage") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Staff Complaint") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Travel & ID - Other") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"UMCS delivery issue") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"UMCS label issue") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Unaddressed mail booking service") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Unauthorised Hold/Redirection application") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Unauthorised MRS application") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Unauthorised Safe Drop") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Privacy breach") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Web & Apps - Other") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Website technical issues") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Carding issue") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Delayed delivery") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Disputed delivery scan") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Facility reported damages") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Redirection Failure") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Express guarantee failure") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Delivered to no junk mail address") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Lodgement issue") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"SPB – Graffiti/Damage/New") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"SPB – Request removal/relocation") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Direct marketing opt out") || IsPickval (EnquirySubType__c,"Website/app technical issues")) ,true,false)
CustomField.label: Is Complaint
